com.ftdi.j2xx.interfaces

Interface Gpio

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FT_4222_Gpio

    public interface Gpio

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int init(int[] gpio)
      Initialize the GPIO interface
      int read(int portNum, boolean[] bValue)
      Read the value from the specified GPIO pin.
      int write(int portNum, boolean bValue)
      Write value to the specified GPIO pin.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        int init(int[] gpio)
        Initialize the GPIO interface
        Parameters:
        gpio - An array defines the directions of GPIO pins. The GPIO direction will be: GPIO_OUTPUT GPIO_INPUT
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • read

        int read(int portNum,
       boolean[] bValue)
        Read the value from the specified GPIO pin.
        Parameters:
        portNum - GPIO port number.
        bValue - A variable of typeBOOL which receives the value of the GPIO pin.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • write

        int write(int portNum,
        boolean bValue)
        Write value to the specified GPIO pin.
        Parameters:
        portNum - GPIO port number.
        bValue - The output value.
        Returns:
        0 if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.
